categories: Sol Patrol II Long Sleeve Shirt
description:
Stay cool on hot days without getting burned. The Sol Patrol Shirt is made of featherlight fabric that wicks sweat and breathes well, but still provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Mesh vents at the back and sides let the breeze flow through to cool you down on hot hikes, sweltering paddling trips or tropical adventures.Made of incredibly lightweight and quick-drying polyester ripstop with 45% recycled content.Double-layer collar can stand up to protect your neck or fold down and secure with hidden snaps.2 mesh-lined chest pockets and an inset zippered chest pocket hold valuables.Durable plastic zipper won't corrode in wet environments.Sleeves can be rolled up and held in place with fabric tabs.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Sol Patrol II Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
